sentences.en: A thirty-nine-year-old competitor collapsed half-way through the marathon and died shortly afterwards.
sentences.cn: 一名39岁的马拉松参赛者跑到一半时瘫倒在地，没过多久就死了。

sentences.en: Afterwards she was sorry for what she'd said.
sentences.cn: 后来她后悔说了那些话。

sentences.en: Afterwards, I was asked to write a book.
sentences.cn: 后来，有人要我写一本书。

sentences.en: Afterwards, retrospective fear of the responsibility would make her feel almost faint.
sentences.cn: 后来，回想起要负的责任她几乎会吓晕过去。

sentences.en: Afterwards, we picnicked on the riverbank.
Before the race, he is fine. But afterwards he is worn out.
sentences.cn: 赛前他状态很好，赛后就筋疲力尽了。
过了不多久，查尔斯来了。

sentences.en: Christie looked relaxed and calm as he faced the press afterwards.
sentences.cn: 后来面对记者的时候，克里斯蒂显得放松而镇静。

sentences.en: Don't worry, your luggage will come on afterwards by taxi.
sentences.cn: 别担心，你的行李随后会由出租车送过来。

sentences.en: I've got a pile of questions afterwards for you.
sentences.cn: 我有一大堆的问题等着过后问你。

sentences.en: James was taken to hospital but died soon afterwards.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯被送往医院，但随后不久就死了。

sentences.en: She wondered where they were going to rendezvous afterwards.
sentences.cn: 她想知道之后他们要去哪里约会。

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards, cuts in defence spending forced the aerospace industry to retrench.
sentences.cn: 不久之后，国防开支的削减迫使航空航天业紧缩开支。

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards, police arrested four suspects.
sentences.cn: 之后不久，警方逮捕了4名嫌犯。

sentences.en: We had a few drinks afterwards.
Weddings are so much hassle that you need a good break afterwards.
sentences.cn: 婚礼真是件折腾人的事，办完后得好好休息才行。

sentences.en: You can go home afterwards and watch Inspector Morse in colour.
sentences.cn: 之后你就可以回家，看彩色版的电视连续剧《摩斯警长》。

words.tran_cn: 事后的想法；后来添加的东西

trans.tran_en: after an event or time that has already been mentioned
